casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Rayford Lewis BURKE 181A93-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2019 Franklin E. Wells, Jr., Attorney at Law, Asheboro, Gretchen Engel, Attorney at Law, Durham, for Burke, Rayford Lewis Danielle Marquis Elder, Jonathan Babb, Special Deputy Attorneys General, Mikko Red Arrow, Assistant District Attorney, Jonathan P. Babb, Special Counsel to Attorney General, Sarah Kirkman, District Attorney, for State of N.C. Jonathan P. Babb, Special Counsel to Attorney General, for State of N.C. Malcolm Ray Hunter, Jr., Attorney at Law, Durham, for Burke, Rayford Lewis Christopher A. Brook, Legal Director, Burton Craige, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, James Coleman, Attorney at Law, Irving Joyner, Attorney at Law, Durham, Cassandra Stubbs, Attorney at Law, for ACLU Capital Punishment Project, et al. Carlos E. Mahoney, Attorney at Law, Jin Hee Lee, Attorney at Law, Pro Hac Vice, Merrel Murray, Attorney at Law, Pro Hac Vice, for NAACP Legal Defense and Educational Fund, Inc. Brian W. Stull, Attorney at Law, Henderson Hill, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Promise of Justice Initiative, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th of April 2019 by ACLU-NCLF to Substitute Counsel:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of June 2019."

Ervin. J. recused
